chest.name: Wall Pushups
chest.description: Stand facing wall, push against it with hands shoulder-width apart.

chest.name: Knee Pushups
chest.description: Do pushups with knees on ground instead of feet for easier version.

chest.name: Standard Pushups
chest.description: In plank position, lower chest to ground and push back up.

chest.name: Wide Pushups
chest.description: Do pushups with hands placed wider than shoulders to target outer chest.

chest.name: Incline Pushups
chest.description: Do pushups with hands on elevated surface like chair or bench.

chest.name: Decline Pushups
chest.description: Do pushups with feet elevated on stable surface for extra challenge.

arms.name: Tricep Dips
arms.description: Using chair or bench, lower body and push back up focusing on triceps.

arms.name: Diamond Pushups
arms.description: Do pushups with hands close together forming diamond shape under chest.

arms.name: Arm Circles
arms.description: Stand with arms out, make forward then backward circles of different sizes.

arms.name: Chair Tricep Extensions
arms.description: Face away from chair, dip down and up using triceps.

arms.name: Wall Pushups Close Grip
arms.description: Do wall pushups with hands closer than shoulder width.

arms.name: Plank Up-Downs
arms.description: In plank, lower to forearms then push back up, alternating arms.

shoulders.name: Pike Pushups
shoulders.description: Form inverted V with body, bend arms to lower head toward ground.

shoulders.name: Wall Angels
shoulders.description: Against wall, slide arms up and down while maintaining contact.

shoulders.name: Arm Raises
shoulders.description: Stand straight, raise arms out to sides up to shoulder level.

shoulders.name: Front Raises
shoulders.description: Stand straight, raise arms in front of you to shoulder height.

shoulders.name: Shoulder Taps
shoulders.description: Hold plank position while alternating shoulder taps with hands.

shoulders.name: Reverse Snow Angels
shoulders.description: Lie face down, sweep arms up overhead and back to sides.

back.name: Superman Holds
back.description: Lie face down, extend arms forward. Lift chest and legs off ground, hold, then lower.

back.name: Bird Dogs
back.description: On hands and knees, extend opposite arm and leg. Hold, return, then alternate.

back.name: Wall Slides
back.description: Stand with back against wall. Slide hands up and down the wall in a circular motion.

back.name: Prone Y Raises
back.description: Lie face down, raise arms in Y position. Hold briefly, then lower.

back.name: Chair Pulls
back.description: Sitting in chair, grasp sides. Pull chest up while keeping feet planted.

back.name: Reverse Snow Angels
back.description: Lie face down, make snow angel motion with arms while lifting chest.

abs.name: Crunches
abs.description: Lie on back, knees bent. Lift shoulders off ground using abs, lower back down.

abs.name: Plank Hold
abs.description: Hold pushup position on forearms, keeping body straight. Maintain for time.

abs.name: Mountain Climbers
abs.description: In plank position, alternate bringing knees toward chest in running motion.

abs.name: Bicycle Crunches
abs.description: Lie on back, alternate touching elbow to opposite knee while extending other leg.

abs.name: Dead Bug
abs.description: Lie on back, extend opposite arm and leg while keeping others raised.

abs.name: Flutter Kicks
abs.description: Lie on back, legs straight. Alternate raising legs up and down in small motions.

legs.name: Squats
legs.description: Stand feet shoulder-width, bend knees to lower body, keep back straight.

legs.name: Lunges
legs.description: Take big step forward, lower back knee toward ground, then push back up.

legs.name: Calf Raises
legs.description: Stand straight, rise up onto toes then lower heels back down.

legs.name: Wall Sit
legs.description: Slide down wall until thighs are parallel to ground, hold position.

legs.name: Step Ups
legs.description: Step up onto elevated surface with one leg, then back down. Alternate legs.

legs.name: Glute Bridges
legs.description: Lie on back, knees bent, lift hips up and squeeze glutes.
